meanings: be[come, go] near(doing), almost, nearly, just barely escape(doing)
be frightened out of one´s senses[wits]
be frightened out of one´s wits

meanings.meaning: be, come, etc. within a whisker of something/doing something

vlive.korean: 뻔하다. It's too obvious. 듣기 View video BRAVE Entertainment : 빅스타 다시 시작 고민상담소 3

vlive.korean: 잃어버릴뻔하다 다시 찾았죠. but I found it again. 듣기 View video B1A4 : 집에서 ㅎㅎㅎ
안 봐도 뻔하다. You don't have to tell us about it. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]변혁의 사랑 X 앞터V (Revolutionary Love X Early Interview)
vlive.english: You don't have to tell us about it.

vlive.korean: 맞지? - 진짜 형 뻔하다. Right? - That's too obvious. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] GOT7​ X Happiness Train - 갓세븐의 행복행!

examples.korean: It is as plain as day that the results won't be good, since you didn't put in much effort. 발음듣기 열심히 노력을 안 했으니 결과가 안 좋을 것은 불 보듯 뻔하다. 생활 표현 사전
examples.english: It is as plain as day that the results won't be good, since you didn't put in much effort. 발음

examples.korean: The result is predictable. 발음듣기 결과는 보나 마나 뻔하다 Neungyule
He obviously isn't coming. 발음듣기 그는 오지 않을 것이 뻔하다 Neungyule
It's obvious that he won't come. 발음듣기 그는 오지 않을 것이 뻔하다 Neungyule
examples.english: It's obvious that he won't come. 발음

examples.korean: It's obvious what will come of it. 발음듣기 결과는 보나 마나 뻔하다 Neungyule
